籤詩版本二:
Ke hoʻomālamalama ka makani i nā kukui a me nā aka liʻiliʻi i ka lewa, lilo lākou me he pua i ke aniani i ka hiʻona.
Ua luhi au a ua noi ʻia e nā keiki e mālama iaʻu, pehea wau e ʻike ai he hoʻopunipuni wale nō?
詩意:
Ua like kēia hexagram me ka makani e hoʻomālamalama ana i ke kukui.
ʻO ka inoa hoʻopunipuni ka mea pōʻino i nā mea a pau.
解曰: Aia ka waiwai ma ka lani. ʻO ka ʻilihune ka hopena. ʻAʻole pono e ʻimi i ka ʻōlelo aʻo. Ua koho mua ʻia nā mea a pau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻO ka huakaʻi ʻeono a Kong Ming mai Qishan
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ua holo ʻo Qishan Mountain ma waena o Wei lāua ʻo Shu.
ʻO ke ono o kona hele ʻana i Qishan, kākau ʻo Kong Ming i kāna mau ʻōlelo aʻo, akā ʻaʻole hiki iā ia ke lanakila ma ka hopena. I ka hopena, ua make ʻo Zhuge Liang i ka maʻi ma Wuzhangyuan i ka makahiki 54 ma muli o ka hana nui.
(He ʻōlelo hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo no "ʻaʻole like ka naʻauao me ka karma")
聖意: E pule no kou home, e akahele, e imi i ka waiwai a me ka waiwai, e akahele ma ka oihana, e akahele i kou mare ana, e akahele i kou mare ana, e malu, e malu, e malu, e loaa kanaka, e lilo i ka enuhe kilika, e poino, e lilo na holoholona. , nalo, nalo, nā hoʻopiʻi lehulehu, nalo i ke kālā, e neʻe, e conservative, e lilo ka waiwai, e maʻi, e maʻi, e hewa i nā loli nui ma Yinshan,
古人: Ka Huakai Eono a Kongming mai Qishan
